prompts.refine: just correct grammer and words if necessary for following sentense, '{text}'
prompts.generate: based on the following json file, your task is to generate proper prompt that will understand users problem from input key and using other options and also take care of not to generate extra text only create prompt in following format generated prompt> json_file = {json}
prompts.transform: from_this={from_this}, to_this={to_this}:you can observe the style, format, and way of writing of 'from_this'. The task is to transfer its characteristics to given prompt with name of 'to_this' without altering too_this's main purpose, only generating a prompt with characteristics of from_this's prompt dont generate anything else,'type':'Content','format':'generated prompt'
prompts.document: I want you to act as a prompt generator. Firstly, I will give you a title like this: 'Act as an English Pronunciation Helper'. Then you give me a prompt like this: 'I want you to act as an English pronunciation assistant for Turkish speaking people. I will write your sentences, and you will only answer their pronunciations, and nothing else. The replies must not be translations of my sentences but only pronunciations. Pronunciations should use Turkish Latin letters for phonetics. Do not write explanations on replies. My first sentence is 'how the weather is in Istanbul?'.' (You should adapt the sample prompt according to the title I gave. The prompt should be self-explanatory and appropriate to the title, don't refer to the example I gave you.). My first title is as i provided pdf at start use its information create chatbot that will have context of that pdf and based on it answer when question asked (Give me prompt only)
